description: This Java class 'NoteViewModel' is part of an Android application. It extends 'AndroidViewModel' and manages UI-related data for notes, including sorting, retrieving, inserting, updating, and deleting notes via a 'NoteRepository'. It encapsulates logic for observing data changes, sorting notes based on title or date, and exposing LiveData to UI components.

classes.name: NoteViewModel
classes.description: The primary class managing note data for the Android app, handling data retrieval, sorting, and CRUD operations.

classes.name: NoteViewModel.SortField
classes.description: Enumeration defining sort criteria: by TITLE or DATE.

methods.name: NoteViewModel
methods.description: Constructor initializing the ViewModel and setting up data observation.

methods.name: setNotesList
methods.description: Private method to sort and update the notes list based on the current sort field.

methods.name: getNotes
methods.description: Returns LiveData containing the list of notes.

methods.name: getNoteById
methods.description: Fetches a specific note by its ID.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Filters notes based on the provided search query.

methods.name: sortBy
methods.description: Sets the sorting criteria and refreshes the notes list.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new note into the repository.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note in the repository.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note from the repository.
